amendment.description: An amendment numbered 27 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to reduce funding by $10,000,000 for the Global Environment Facility Fund.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding by $10,000,000 for the Global Environment Facility Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kelly (MS) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 231 (Roll no. 471).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kelly (MS) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 231 (Roll no. 471).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
